conbody.p: By starting an account with Clockify you will have access to the time tracker tool, along with team creation, project management, report tracking, and many other useful features. This will allow you to view the productivity of individuals, teams, and projects within your Clockify account.

Starting a team or project will allow you to track the process of multiple people at anytime. This is a useful way to stay organized and keep everone connected. The owner can also choose how much access to grant to other team members. Filling out report summarys will help ensure that projects are organized and tracked properly, as well as staying up to date with progress information. You can customize your organization according to your needs as you get more familiar with Clockify.
